casebody.data:
Angel L. ORTIZ
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016 W. Theodore Koch III, assigned counsel, in support of the petition. Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Angel L. Ortiz' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 635 , 145 A.3d 937 (2016), is denied.
